data.title: World Cube Association
data.meta_description: The World Cube Association governs competitions for mechanical puzzles that are operated by twisting groups of pieces, commonly known as 'twisty puzzles'. The most famous of these puzzles is the Rubik's Cube, invented by professor Rubik from Hungary. A selection of these puzzles are chosen as official events of the WCA.
data.text:
Create a WCA account here if you don't have one.

If this is not your first competition, associate your WCA ID to your WCA account here.

Register for this competition here.

There is a competitor limit of 35 competitors.

The base registration fee for this competition is L100 (Honduran Lempira).

Registration fees won't be refunded under any circumstance.

Registrants on the waiting list may be accepted onto the competitor list until .

If you are a registered competitor you may change your registered events until on the Register tab.

On the spot registrations will be accepted with a base registration fee of L100 (Honduran Lempira).

Any spectator can attend for free.

INFORMACION IMPORTANTE

Hay un límite de 35 competidores.

La cuota de registro básica para esta competición es de L. 100 (Honduran Lempira).

Las cuotas de registro no se reembolsarán bajo ninguna circunstancia.

Los competidores registrados en la lista de espera pueden ser aceptados en la lista de competidores hasta Sabado, 25 de Marzo de 2023, 18:00 GMT-6.

Pedimos a todos que se registren para las categorías en las que quieran competir, mediante el formulario online de registro, sin embargo, podrás añadir categorías a tu registro hasta que la categoría haya comenzado.

Se aceptarán registros in situ con una cuota base de registro de L. 100 (Honduran Lempira).

PASOS PARA ESTAR INSCRITO

▶ Realizar pago de L.100 a la cuenta No. 200006481182 del Banco Ficohsa a nombre de *Joel Michael Weed.

▶ Mandar un correo electrónico con una foto/captura del recibo de pago a "Lmejia@worldcubeassociation.org" incluyendo:

Nombre Completo:

WCA ID: (SI CUENTAN CON UNO)

Fecha de nacimiento:

Categorías registradas:

▶ Si no es posible realizar el pago en la cuenta de banco, enviar un correo electrónico a "Lmejia@worldcubeassociation.org" con tu nombre, WCA ID y la razón de esto, para trabajar en la mejor solución posible.

Su registro no está completo hasta que su nombre aparezca en la lista. Si ya realizó su pago y su nombre no aparece (después de 48 horas), por favor envié un correo a ¨Lmejia@worldcubeassociation.org¨.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

There is a limit of 35 competitors.

The basic registration fee for this competition is L. 100 (Honduran Lempira).

Registration fees will not be refunded under any circumstances.

Competitors registered in the waiting list can be accepted in the list of competitors until Saturday, March 25, 2023, 18:00 GMT-6.

We ask everyone to register for the categories in which they want to compete, using the online registration form, however, you will be able to add categories to your registration until the category has started.

On-site registrations will be accepted with a base registration fee of L. 100 (Honduran Lempira).

STEPS TO BE REGISTERED

▶ Make a payment of L.100 to account No. 200006481182 of the Bank Ficohsa* in the name of *Joel Michael Weed.

▶ Send an email with a photo/screenshot of the payment receipt to "Lmejia@worldcubeassociation.org" including:

Full name:

WCA ID: (IF YOU HAVE ONE)

Date of Birth:

Registered categories:

▶ If it is not possible to make the payment in the bank account, send an email to "Lmejia@worldcubeassociation.org" with your name, WCA ID and the reason for this, to work on the best possible solution.
